innerText: Kiṃ niyametīti kiṃ jhānaṃ upapattiṃ niyametīti attho. Nava brahmaloketi brahmapārisajjādayo navapi sodhetvā. Matthaketi vehapphalesūti attho. Seṭṭhabhavā nāmāti tato paraṃ agamanato uttamabhavāti adhippāyo. Teneva bhavasīsānīti gahitā. Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti vehapphalādiṭṭhānāni eva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vehapphalato pana purimesu navasu nibbattaanāgāmī arūpadhātuṃ upapajjatīti katvā ‘‘rūpadhātuyā cutassa arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassa kassaci satta anusayā anusenti, kassaci pañca, kassaci tayo anusentī’’ti (yama. 2.anusayayamaka.311) idaṃ vuttaṃ, na vehapphalādīsu upapannaṃ sandhāyāti ayamettha adhippāyo siyā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ‘‘navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariyasāvakānaṃ tatrūpapattiyeva hoti, na heṭṭhūpapattī’’ti, etena heṭṭhūpapatti eva nivāritā, na tesveva uparūpari vehapphale ca upapatti arūpadhātūpapatti ca. ‘‘Paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbatto anāgāmī nava brahmaloke sodhetvā matthake ṭhito parinibbātī’’ti idampi anupubbena ārohantaṃ sandhāya vuttanti na tena tassa matthakaṃ appattassa arūpadhātuṃ upapatti nivāritāti daṭṭhabbā.
